schema.description: Single source of truth for all Vici Peptides product information, pricing, stock status, imagery, and SEO metadata

fields.name: Product_Name
fields.description: The official peptide product name (base name without strength)

choices: Weight Loss / Blood Sugar Control / Metabolic Regulation

fields.name: In_Stock
fields.description: Controls if product variant is visible on the live site

fields.name: SKU_Code
fields.description: Unique product SKU for this variant

fields.name: Full_Description
fields.description: Full product description (Markdown supported) used on product detail page

fields.name: Image_URL
fields.description: Product images (used for shop grid and details)

fields.name: API_Visibility_Status
fields.description: Derived logic: LIVE if In_Stock=✅ and Is_Discontinued=☐

exampleRecords.Category: Weight Loss / Blood Sugar Control / Metabolic Regulation
exampleRecords.Short_Description: Triple hormone receptor agonist for metabolic research
exampleRecords.Full_Description: RETATRUTIDE IS A TRIPLE HORMONE RECEPTOR AGONIST TARGETING GLP-1, GIP, AND GLUCAGON RECEPTORS FOR RESEARCH INTO METABOLIC REGULATION. RESEARCH APPLICATIONS INCLUDE INVESTIGATIONS INTO GLUCOSE HOMEOSTASIS, WEIGHT MANAGEMENT, APPETITE CONTROL, AND METABOLIC SYNDROME IN EXPERIMENTAL MODELS.
exampleRecords.SEO_Description: High-purity Retatrutide 5mg peptide for lab use. Research-grade quality with triple hormone receptor agonist activity.
exampleRecords.Research_Applications: Retatrutide is used in laboratory research to investigate triple hormone receptor activation for metabolic regulation. Research applications include studies on glucose homeostasis, weight management mechanisms, appetite control, insulin sensitivity, and metabolic syndrome in experimental models.
exampleRecords.Storage_Requirements: Store lyophilized powder at -20°C in a dry environment. Protect from light and moisture. Reconstituted solution should be stored at 4°C for up to 14 days. Maintain sterile conditions during reconstitution.
exampleRecords.Handling_Guidelines: Handle using sterile techniques and appropriate laboratory personal protective equipment (PPE). Use in well-ventilated areas. Avoid inhalation, ingestion, or skin contact. Follow standard laboratory safety protocols. Refer to Material Safety Data Sheet (MSDS) for complete safety information.

exampleRecords.Research_Applications: Retatrutide is used in laboratory research to investigate triple hormone receptor activation for metabolic regulation. Research applications include studies on glucose homeostasis, weight management mechanisms, appetite control, insulin sensitivity, and metabolic syndrome in experimental models.
exampleRecords.Storage_Requirements: Store lyophilized powder at -20°C in a dry environment. Protect from light and moisture. Reconstituted solution should be stored at 4°C for up to 14 days. Maintain sterile conditions during reconstitution.

exampleRecords.Short_Description: Synthetic tetrapeptide for cellular aging and telomere research
exampleRecords.Full_Description: EPITALON IS A SYNTHETIC TETRAPEPTIDE COMPOUND (ALA-GLU-ASP-GLY) DEVELOPED BY VLADIMIR KHABAROV AND STUDIED FOR ITS POTENTIAL ROLE IN CELLULAR AGING AND TELOMERE MAINTENANCE PROCESSES. RESEARCH APPLICATIONS INCLUDE INVESTIGATIONS INTO TELOMERE LENGTH MODULATION, CELLULAR SENESCENCE DELAY, PINEAL GLAND FUNCTION, MELATONIN SECRETION REGULATION, AND AGING-RELATED GENE EXPRESSION IN EXPERIMENTAL MODELS.
exampleRecords.SEO_Description: High-purity Epitalon 10mg peptide for lab use. Research-grade synthetic tetrapeptide for cellular aging research.
exampleRecords.Research_Applications: Epitalon is used in laboratory research to investigate cellular aging mechanisms and telomere maintenance. Research applications include studies on telomere length modulation, cellular senescence delay, pineal gland function, melatonin secretion regulation, and aging-related gene expression in experimental models.
exampleRecords.Storage_Requirements: Store lyophilized powder at 2-8°C in airtight, light-blocking containers. Protect from light, air, and moisture. Reconstituted solution should be stored at 4°C for up to 14 days. Maintain sterile conditions during reconstitution.
exampleRecords.Handling_Guidelines: Handle using sterile techniques and appropriate laboratory personal protective equipment (PPE). Use in well-ventilated areas. Avoid inhalation, ingestion, or skin contact. Follow standard laboratory safety protocols. Refer to Material Safety Data Sheet (MSDS) for complete safety information.

exampleRecords.Category: Weight Loss / Blood Sugar Control / Metabolic Regulation
exampleRecords.Short_Description: HGH fragment for metabolic and lipolysis research
exampleRecords.Full_Description: AOD9604 IS A SYNTHETIC PEPTIDE FRAGMENT DERIVED FROM HUMAN GROWTH HORMONE (HGH) FOR RESEARCH INTO METABOLIC REGULATION. RESEARCH APPLICATIONS INCLUDE INVESTIGATIONS INTO LIPOLYSIS, FAT METABOLISM, WEIGHT MANAGEMENT, AND METABOLIC SYNDROME IN EXPERIMENTAL MODELS.
exampleRecords.SEO_Description: High-purity AOD9604 5mg peptide for lab use. Research-grade HGH fragment for metabolic and lipolysis research.
exampleRecords.Research_Applications: AOD9604 is used in laboratory research to investigate metabolic regulation and lipolysis mechanisms. Research applications include studies on fat metabolism, weight management, metabolic syndrome, and growth hormone-related metabolic processes in experimental models.
exampleRecords.Storage_Requirements: Store lyophilized powder at -20°C in a dry environment. Protect from light and moisture. Reconstituted solution should be stored at 4°C for up to 14 days. Maintain sterile conditions during reconstitution.
exampleRecords.Handling_Guidelines: Handle using sterile techniques and appropriate laboratory personal protective equipment (PPE). Use in well-ventilated areas. Avoid inhalation, ingestion, or skin contact. Follow standard laboratory safety protocols. Refer to Material Safety Data Sheet (MSDS) for complete safety information.

exampleRecords.Short_Description: Synthetic GHRH analog for growth hormone research
exampleRecords.Full_Description: TESAMORELIN IS A SYNTHETIC GROWTH HORMONE-RELEASING HORMONE (GHRH) ANALOG FOR RESEARCH INTO GROWTH HORMONE SECRETION AND METABOLIC REGULATION. RESEARCH APPLICATIONS INCLUDE INVESTIGATIONS INTO GROWTH HORMONE RELEASE, PITUITARY FUNCTION, METABOLIC REGULATION, AND GROWTH FACTOR MODULATION IN EXPERIMENTAL MODELS.
exampleRecords.SEO_Description: High-purity Tesamorelin 5mg peptide for lab use. Research-grade synthetic GHRH analog for growth hormone research.
exampleRecords.Research_Applications: Tesamorelin is used in laboratory research to investigate growth hormone-releasing hormone (GHRH) activity. Research applications include studies on growth hormone secretion, pituitary function, metabolic regulation, growth factor modulation, and age-related growth hormone decline in experimental models.
exampleRecords.Storage_Requirements: Store lyophilized powder at -20°C in a dry environment. Protect from light and moisture. Reconstituted solution should be stored at 4°C for up to 14 days. Maintain sterile conditions during reconstitution.
exampleRecords.Handling_Guidelines: Handle using sterile techniques and appropriate laboratory personal protective equipment (PPE). Use in well-ventilated areas. Avoid inhalation, ingestion, or skin contact. Follow standard laboratory safety protocols. Refer to Material Safety Data Sheet (MSDS) for complete safety information.

exampleRecords.Short_Description: Synthetic GHRH analog for growth hormone research
exampleRecords.Full_Description: TESAMORELIN IS A SYNTHETIC GROWTH HORMONE-RELEASING HORMONE (GHRH) ANALOG FOR RESEARCH INTO GROWTH HORMONE SECRETION AND METABOLIC REGULATION. RESEARCH APPLICATIONS INCLUDE INVESTIGATIONS INTO GROWTH HORMONE RELEASE, PITUITARY FUNCTION, METABOLIC REGULATION, AND GROWTH FACTOR MODULATION IN EXPERIMENTAL MODELS.
exampleRecords.SEO_Description: High-purity Tesamorelin 10mg peptide for lab use. Research-grade synthetic GHRH analog for growth hormone research.
exampleRecords.Research_Applications: Tesamorelin is used in laboratory research to investigate growth hormone-releasing hormone (GHRH) activity. Research applications include studies on growth hormone secretion, pituitary function, metabolic regulation, growth factor modulation, and age-related growth hormone decline in experimental models.
exampleRecords.Storage_Requirements: Store lyophilized powder at -20°C in a dry environment. Protect from light and moisture. Reconstituted solution should be stored at 4°C for up to 14 days. Maintain sterile conditions during reconstitution.
exampleRecords.Handling_Guidelines: Handle using sterile techniques and appropriate laboratory personal protective equipment (PPE). Use in well-ventilated areas. Avoid inhalation, ingestion, or skin contact. Follow standard laboratory safety protocols. Refer to Material Safety Data Sheet (MSDS) for complete safety information.

exampleRecords.Short_Description: Neurotrophic peptide preparation for neurological research
exampleRecords.Full_Description: CEREBROLYSIN IS A NEUROTROPHIC PEPTIDE PREPARATION DERIVED FROM PORCINE BRAIN TISSUE, CONTAINING NEUROTROPHIC FACTORS INCLUDING BRAIN-DERIVED NEUROTROPHIC FACTOR (BDNF), NERVE GROWTH FACTOR (NGF), AND OTHER NEUROTROPHIC PEPTIDES. RESEARCH APPLICATIONS INCLUDE INVESTIGATIONS INTO NEUROPROTECTION, NEURONAL PLASTICITY, SYNAPTIC FUNCTION, COGNITIVE FUNCTION, AND NEURODEGENERATIVE DISEASE PROCESSES IN EXPERIMENTAL MODELS.
exampleRecords.SEO_Description: High-purity Cerebrolysin 60ml for lab use. Research-grade neurotrophic peptide preparation for neurological research.
exampleRecords.Research_Applications: Cerebrolysin is used in laboratory research to investigate neuroprotection and neuronal plasticity. Research applications include studies on cognitive function, synaptic plasticity, neurogenesis, stroke recovery, traumatic brain injury, Alzheimer's disease, and other neurodegenerative conditions in experimental models.
exampleRecords.Storage_Requirements: Store at 2-8°C. Protect from light and freezing. Do not freeze. Maintain sterile conditions. Use within expiration date.
exampleRecords.Handling_Guidelines: Handle using sterile techniques and appropriate laboratory personal protective equipment (PPE). Use in well-ventilated areas. Avoid inhalation, ingestion, or skin contact. Follow standard laboratory safety protocols. Refer to Material Safety Data Sheet (MSDS) for complete safety information.

exampleRecords.Short_Description: Essential coenzyme for cellular metabolism and energy production research
exampleRecords.Full_Description: NICOTINAMIDE ADENINE DINUCLECTIDE (NAD+) IS A COENZYME FOUND IN ALL LIVING CELLS THAT PLAYS A CRITICAL ROLE IN CELLULAR METABOLISM, ENERGY PRODUCTION, AND DNA REPAIR MECHANISMS. RESEARCH APPLICATIONS INCLUDE INVESTIGATIONS INTO CELLULAR AGING, MITOCHONDRIAL FUNCTION, SIRTUIN ACTIVATION, DNA REPAIR PATHWAYS, AND METABOLIC REGULATION IN EXPERIMENTAL MODELS.
exampleRecords.SEO_Description: High-purity NAD+ 100mg for lab use. Research-grade essential coenzyme for cellular metabolism and energy production research.
exampleRecords.Research_Applications: NAD+ is used in laboratory research to investigate cellular metabolism, energy production, and aging mechanisms. Research applications include studies on sirtuin activation, mitochondrial function, DNA repair pathways, cellular senescence, metabolic regulation, and age-related disease processes in experimental models.
exampleRecords.Storage_Requirements: Store lyophilized powder at -20°C in a dry environment. Protect from light, air, and moisture. Reconstituted solution should be stored at 4°C and used promptly. Maintain sterile conditions during reconstitution.
exampleRecords.Handling_Guidelines: Handle using sterile techniques and appropriate laboratory personal protective equipment (PPE). Use in well-ventilated areas. Avoid inhalation, ingestion, or skin contact. NAD+ is sensitive to light and should be protected from direct exposure. Follow standard laboratory safety protocols. Refer to Material Safety Data Sheet (MSDS) for complete safety information.
